name: The Rewarded and The Slimepressed
description:
One player, plays as a depressed slime who just want to die, problem is that only the hero can do so. On the other hand we also have the hero, who only wants to kill monsters, with the slime being an exception, ofcause.

Slime goal: Get killed.

Controls: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT arrow and right ctrl SPACE.

Hero goal: Kill monsters, not the slime.

Controls: WASD, SPACE.

Credits: 

  • Daniel Kierkegaard Andersen - Game designer, programmer and solo for most of the project
  • Kasper Jensen - Knight, slime and enemy - 3D.
  • Katrine Martos Sandø - Helping hand?
